+				versionFilePath = "#{path}/.version"
+				versionFileContents = if grunt.file.exists(versionFilePath) then grunt.file.read(versionFilePath) else ""
+				versionsInFile = versionFileContents.split("\n")
+				artifactVersion = artifact.version.trim()
+				i = 0
+				newVersionsInFile = []
+				while i < versionsInFile.length
+					trimmedVersion = versionsInFile[i].trim()
+					if trimmedVersion != "" and trimmedVersion != artifactVersion
+						newVersionsInFile.push trimmedVersion
+					i += 1
+				newVersionsInFile.push artifactVersion
+				newVersionFileContents = newVersionsInFile.join "\n"
+				grunt.log.writeln "newVersionFileContents: #{newVersionFileContents}"
+				grunt.file.write versionFilePath, newVersionFileContents
 				deferred.resolve()
